review: I could not resist the 30 day free trial, so I ordered it. I hooked it up immediately and checked out the speech recognition, since this is where I had my doubts. IT WORKS GREAT. You tell it what you want, it finds it quickly, and shows the various places and formats that are available. It is a great tool to help navigate the sea of offerings from Amazon, NETFLIX, Hulu, etc.
